text:
[Verse]
Night falls so bright
Under city lights
Dancing in the cool breeze
Heart skips with ease

[Verse 2]
Moonlight on the run
Chasing dreams for fun
Whispers in the air
Life without a scare

[Chorus]
Under the starry skies
We shine in each other's eyes
Lost in the moment here
Free from every fear

[Verse 3]
Twinkling stories told
Memories like gold
Every laugh we share
Fills the night with flair

[Chorus]
Under the starry skies
We shine in each other's eyes
Lost in the moment here
Free from every fear

[Bridge]
Stars paint our fate
It's never too late
With every step we take
New adventures we make
title: Under the Starry Skies
